title: Selective Conversion of Carbon Dioxide to Formate Using Three-Layer Nitrogen-Doped Graphene on Copper Foam with Enhanced Suppression of Hydrogen Evolution Reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00550C, Paper
Thanthita Sasipatworakarn, Daranphop Pikulrat, Kan Homlamai, Salatan Duangdangchote, Montree Sawangphruk
This research presents a novel electrocatalyst, a three-dimensional, approximately three-layered nitrogen-doped graphene-coated copper foam (N-GP/Cu-Foam), engineered for the selective electrochemical reduction of carbon dioxide (CO2) to formate. Formate serves as...
